title: Vic_Firth-Snare_Drum_Rudiments
description:
Tracker : http://thepiratebay.se
From : Dr. John Wooton
URL : http://www.vicfirth.com/education/rudiments.html

40 ESSENTIAL SNARE DRUM RUDIMENTS

Welcome to Vic Firth&#039;s Drum Rudiment page! Included in this section of the website are all 40 of The Percussive Arts Society&#039;s Essential Snare Drum Rudiments, along with videos of each rudiment being performed by Dr. John Wooton, audio play-along files, exercises that apply the rudiment to "real world" musical phrases and practice suggestions from the Vic Firth Education Team. To get started, grab your sticks and a practice pad and select a rudiment from one of the rudimental families below!

*This is the video .mov i took from vicfirth.com and convert it to .avi XdiV with the corresponding files names. I found that rudiments videos 04,11,12,15,18,28,36,37 are missing from the web site...
